data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Vidisha are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Vidisha, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Vidisha hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary: On average, 118 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Vidisha, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Vidisha.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Vidisha, Madhya Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Chidar people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Vidisha, Madhya Pradesh, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Vidisha, Madhya Pradesh, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary:
the county of Vidisha, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,458,900.

We estimate Vidisha has 16,048 people who might know Jesus, 17,701 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,425,151 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 16,048 believers in the county of Vidisha.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.
